CustomField.description: A Single Euro Payments Area Creditor Identifier or SEPA Creditor Id is a standardized and unchanging identification number that serves to unequivocally identify a creditor across Europe.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A Single Euro Payments Area Creditor Identifier or SEPA Creditor Id is a standardized and unchanging identification number that serves to unequivocally identify a creditor across Europe.
CustomField.label: Creditor Identifier
